languages.text: This creature has +5 to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Willpower, Strength, and +1 Resolve for each stack.

traits.locale_text: This creature has +5 to Weapon Skill, Ballistic Skill, Willpower, Strength, and +1 Resolve for each stack.

languages.text: Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.
languages.original_text: Каждый уровень эффекта увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Волю{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} на 5 и {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1.

traits.locale_text: Each stack of the effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

languages.text: Каждый уровень эффекта увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Волю{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} на 5 и {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1.
languages.original_text: Each stack of the effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

traits.locale_text: Каждый уровень эффекта увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Волю{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} на 5 и {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1.

Каждый уровень эффекта увеличивает {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Дальний Бой{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Волю{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силу{/g} на 5 и {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1.

languages.text: この効果のスタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}WS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}STR{/g}が+5され、さらに{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決意力{/g}が+1される。
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

languages.text: Jeder Stapel dieses Effektes erhöht {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffen-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} um +5 und {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um +1.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Stapel dieses Effektes erhöht {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffen-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistik-Fähigkeit{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} um +5 und {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um +1.

languages.text: Bu etkinin her bir birikimi; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliklerini +5 ve {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini +1 artırır.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

traits.locale_text: Bu etkinin her bir birikimi; {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Balistik Yetenek{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliklerini +5 ve {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini +1 artırır.

languages.text: Chaque cumul de cet effet augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +5 et la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de +1.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

traits.locale_text: Chaque cumul de cet effet augmente la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Compétence balistique{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} et la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} de +5 et la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Détermination{/g} de +1.

languages.text: Cada acumulación de este efecto aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} en +5 y la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} en +1.
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

traits.locale_text: Cada acumulación de este efecto aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Habilidad de proyectiles{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} en +5 y la {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} en +1.

languages.text: 每层效果使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高5点，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高1点。
languages.original_text: Each stack of this effect increases {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}Ballistic Skill{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} by +5 and {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1.

traits.locale_text: 每层效果使{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}提高5点，{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}提高1点。
